question_title: Will the interest in “thom tillis” change between 2026-02-03 and 2026-02-10 according to Google Trends?
summary: Thom Tillis has been in an active news cycle since Jan 27-30 (Noem resignation call, Warsh opposition), with baseline value of 24 on Feb 1. Most likely outcome is "Decreases" as typical news cycle decay takes hold - we're 2+ weeks from peak by Feb 10 with no scheduled hearings or events in the window. "Doesn't change" is possible if decay is gradual within ±3 threshold. "Increases" requires significant new developments but is plausible given ongoing Warsh confirmation fight and Tillis's continued provocative statements.

factors.description: News cycle peaked Jan 27-30; by Feb 10 we're 2+ weeks out - typical exponential decay pattern suggests significant drop
No scheduled Senate hearings or major events in Feb 3-10 window found
Warsh confirmation fight is ongoing (Manifold 50%) - could generate new headlines and spike interest
Tillis is 'unleashed' and keeps making provocative statements (fictional villain comparisons, etc.)
The ±3 threshold is narrow (~12% of baseline 24), making 'Doesn't change' less likely
